entry.title: [WAW1][Dedicated Servers] - Network equipment version upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 23, 01:00 - 05:00 UTC

Jan 27, 23:00 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 23/03/2023 01:00 UTC
End time : 23/03/2023 05:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact is expected for the customers who have set the aggregation properly (OLA configured). 
Otherwise, clients who have not defined the aggregation will have their servers temporarily unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a version upgrade on multiple network equipment.

entry.title: [RBX8][Dedicated Servers] - R808R23/R808R24
entry.content:
Mar 8, 06:56 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 07/03/2023 22:12 UTC
End Time : 08/03/2023 05:03 UTC
Root cause :
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Mar 8, 00:46 UTC
Update - Update : Servers in rack R808R23 are reachable since 07/03/2023 23:45 UTC.
Our teams are still working on rack R808R24.

Mar 7, 22:21 UTC
Identified - Start time : 07/03/2023 22:12 UTC
Service impact : Servers in racks R808R23 and R808R24 are temporarily unreachable
Root cause : Electrical issue
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently working to solve the problem
